SELECT DISTINCT A.IDX as idx, A.ORD_TM as ord_tm, A.ORDR_NM as ordr_nm, (CONCAT( ( SELECT PROD_NM FROM ORD_DTL WHERE ORD_IDX = A.IDX LIMIT 1 ) , ' 외 ', ( SELECT PLIST_TOT FROM ORD WHERE IDX = A.idx ), '건')) as prod_nm, A.TOT_AMT as tot_amt, SETL_MN_CD as setl_mn_cd, STATE_CD as state_cd FROM ORD A JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ORD_DTL ) B ON A.IDX = B.ORD_IDX WHERE true
AND A.ORDR_NM LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND A.IDX LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (A.ORDR_NM LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR A.IDX LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY ORD_TM DESC, IDX DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize};
